mapper.select: select * from orders a left outer join detail b on a.orders_idx = b.orders_idx left outer join product c on b.p_idx = c.p_idx left outer join cart d on c.p_idx = d.p_idx where a.midx=#{midx} ;
mapper.insert: insert into orders (orders_totalprice, orders_name, orders_phone, orders_addr, orders_detailaddr, orders_payment, orders_dvprice, orders_point,midx) values(#{orders_totalprice}, #{orders_name}, #{orders_phone}, #{orders_addr}, #{orders_detailaddr}, #{orders_payment}, #{orders_dvprice}, #{orders_point}, #{midx})
